title: New: Oisima – Melting Paraiso
body:
I’ve been keeping a close eye on **Oisima** for a while now, and this track reaffirms my belief that they are one of the hottest producers around at the moment.

With a debut EP in the works, **Oisima** has dropped a new cut in the form of the enthralling _Melting Paraiso_. The vivid atmosphere conjured up is quite unlike anything I’ve heard recently, verging upon shoegaze at times, but grounded amongst electronic influences. Anyway, enough talk, check out _Melting Paraiso_ below.

 [melting paraiso](http://soundcloud.com/oisima/melting-paraiso) by [Oisima](http://soundcloud.com/oisima)
